mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_invoice( id,contractId,paymentPlanFact,planInvoiceDate, factIncoiveDate, planPaymentDate,factPaymentDate,companyPayId, companySaleId, payeeName,checkName,billingName, amtWithoutTax,rate,amtOfTax,amt,remaeks,state ) VALUES ( #{id},#{contractId},#{paymentPlanFact},#{planInvoiceDate},#{factIncoiveDate},#{planPaymentDate},#{factPaymentDate}, #{companyPayId},#{companySaleId},#{payeeName},#{checkName},#{billingName},#{amtWithoutTax},#{rate}, #{amtOfTax},#{amt},#{remaeks}, #{state} )
select $uuid()
